outline:
1. to remain, be left over, be left behind
    1. (Qal) to remain
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be left over, be left alive, survive
        1. remainder, remnant (participle)
      2. to be left behind
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to leave over, spare
      2. to leave or keep over
      3. to have left
      4. to leave (as a gift)
kjv_def: leave, (be) left, let, remain, remnant, reserve, the rest.
strongs_def: properly, to swell up, i.e. be (causatively, make) redundant
